meanings.definition: Whomsoever: the person or persons that; whoever
meanings.sent1: Whomso left their umbrella at the park.
meanings.sent2: I will give this book to whomso needs it.
meanings.sent3: Whomso forgot their lunch, so they had to buy a sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The lost keys were claimed by whomso they belonged to.
meanings.sent5: Whomso wins the race will receive a prize.

meanings.definition: Whomsoever: the person or persons to whom something belongs or is due
meanings.sent1: Whomso found the wallet returned it to its owner.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will speak to whomso is responsible for the mess.
meanings.sent3: Whomso's cat thinks the whole house belongs to them.
meanings.sent4: The trophy was awarded to whomso earned it through hard work.
meanings.sent5: Whomso the package is addressed to must sign for it.
